name: Community Picnic
description: Event only available to community residents. Weather dependent! üå¶Ô∏è Bring your own picnic basket and blanket. We'll provide the live music and games! RSVP preferred but not required.

name: Stampede Breakfast
description: Join us for the yearly tradition of the Calgary Stampede Breakfast! Free pancakes and entertainment for all. Don't forget your cowboy hat!

name: Eau Claire Market Art Show
description: Visit Eau Claire Market for our annual Art Show. Local artists will be showcasing their work. Art pieces will also be available for sale.

name: East Village River Cleanup
description: Help us keep our beautiful Bow River clean! Join the East Village River Cleanup event. Gloves and bags will be provided.

name: Inglewood Night Market
description: Come explore the Inglewood Night Market! Find unique crafts, gourmet foods, and local farmers. There's something for everyone.

name: Bridgeland Farmers Market
description: Fresh produce, homemade crafts, and delicious food trucks. Come and support local vendors at the Bridgeland Farmers Market!

name: Fish Creek Park Birdwatching
description: Join us for a morning of birdwatching in Fish Creek Park. Bring your binoculars and your love for nature!

name: Calgary Tower Climb
description: Rise to the challenge and climb the Calgary Tower! All proceeds go to local charities. Let's make a difference together.

name: Bowness Park Winter Carnival
description: Celebrate the winter season at Bowness Park! Ice skating, hot chocolate, and fun games for the whole family.

name: Stephen Avenue Walk
description: Join us for a guided walk down Stephen Avenue. Discover the history and architecture... of downtown Calgary. Don't forget your camera!

name: Calgary Zoo Guided Tour
description: Join our guided tour at the Calgary Zoo! Learn about wildlife conservation and meet our adorable animals.

name: Prince's Island Park Yoga
description: Join us for a rejuvenating yoga session at Prince's Island Park. Suitable for all levels. Please bring your own mat.

name: Calgary Folk Music Festival
description: Come and enjoy the Calgary Folk Music Festival! A diverse lineup of talented musicians from around the world. Don't miss out!

name: Calgary International Film Festival
description: Join us for the annual Calgary International Film Festival. A showcase of films from around the world. Get your popcorn ready!

name: Heritage Park Historical Village Tour
description: Step back in time with a tour of Heritage Park Historical Village. Learn about the history of Western Canada in an interactive way.

name: Calgary Christmas Market
description: Join us at the Calgary Farmers' Market for our annual Christmas Market! Shop for handcrafted gifts, enjoy holiday entertainment and indulge in festive treats.

name: Calgary Marathon
description: Run the streets of Calgary in the city's biggest road race! Distances for all ages and abilities. Don't forget to hydrate!

name: Calgary Comic & Entertainment Expo
description: Get your geek on at the Calgary Comic & Entertainment Expo! Enjoy panels, shopping, cosplay, and more. Excelsior!

name: Calgary International Beerfest
description: Sample hundreds of beers from local and international breweries at the Calgary International Beerfest. Remember to drink responsibly!

name: Sled Island Music Festival
description: Experience Calgary's vibrant music scene at Sled Island! Featuring over 250 bands across 30 venues. Let's rock!

name: Shakespeare by the Bow
description: Enjoy a Shakespeare play in the great outdoors with Shakespeare by the Bow. Don't forget your picnic blanket!

name: GlobalFest Fireworks Festival
description: Watch the sky light up at the GlobalFest Fireworks Festival! Each night features a different country's display. Ooh, aah!

name: Beakerhead Science Festival
description: Explore the fun side of science at Beakerhead! Featuring interactive installations, workshops, and shows. Science is cool!

name: Calgary International Children's Festival
description: Bring the kids to the Calgary International Children's Festival! Enjoy performances, games, and activities for children of all ages.

name: Calgary Underground Film Festival
description: Discover the best in independent and international cinema at the Calgary Underground Film Festival. See you at the movies!

name: Calgary International Film Festival
description: Experience the best in Canadian and international cinema at the Calgary International Film Festival. Grab your popcorn!

name: Calgary Folk Music Festival
description: Groove to the beat at the Calgary Folk Music Festival. Featuring artists from around the globe. Let the music play!

name: Wordfest
description: Celebrate the written word at Wordfest! Meet authors, attend readings, and discover your next favourite book.

name: Inglewood Sunfest
description: Soak up the sun at Inglewood Sunfest! Enjoy street performers, live music, and local vendors. Fun for all ages!

name: Calgary Pride Parade
description: Show your pride at the Calgary Pride Parade! Celebrate the LGBTQ+ community with a day of diversity and love.

name: Calgary Dragon Boat Race & Festival
description: Join the excitement at the Calgary Dragon Boat Race & Festival! Watch the races and enjoy cultural performances and food.

name: Calgary Highland Games
description: Experience Scottish culture at the Calgary Highland Games. Watch traditional games, listen to bagpipes, and try some haggis!

name: FunnyFest Calgary Comedy Festival
description: Get ready to laugh at the FunnyFest Calgary Comedy Festival! Featuring comedians from across North America. Laughter is the best medicine!

name: Calgary Midwinter Bluesfest
description: Beat the winter blues at the Calgary Midwinter Bluesfest! Enjoy performances by local and international blues artists. Let the blues soothe you!
